mapper.select: select donate_name, donate_birthday, donate_phone_number, donate_email, donate_select, donate_money, donate_message from tbl_donate_member where donate_name = #{donateName} AND donate_phone_number = #{donatePhoneNumber} AND donate_birthday = #{donateBirthday}
select donate_select, donate_description from tbl_donate_select order by donate_select
select donate_option, donate_money from tbl_donate_amount order by donate_money
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_donate_member(donate_name, donate_birthday, donate_phone_number, donate_email, donate_select, donate_money, donate_message) values(#{donateName}, #{donateBirthday}, #{donatePhoneNumber}, #{donateEmail}, #{donateSelect}, #{donateMoney}, #{donateMessage})
